price: Dájúdájú Àwa ṣẹ̀dá ènìyàn láti ara àtọ̀ tó ròpọ̀ mọ́ra wọn (láti ara ọkùnrin àti obìnrin), A sì máa dán an wò.¹ A sì ṣe é ní olùgbọ́, olùríran.
arabic: إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ أَمۡشَاجٖ نَّبۡتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرًا
footnotes: 1. “A sì máa dán an wò.” Ìyẹn ni pé, A máa la ẹ̀sìn bọ̀ ọ́ lọ́rùn nígbà tí ó bá bàlágà.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: innā khalaqnā al-insāna min nuṭ'fatin amshājin nabtalīhi fajaʿalnāhu samīʿan baṣīran
